QuestData.Title: Answering Aggression
QuestData.Description: I weep for the Nightborne this day.$b$b<Silgryn gestures out the door.>$b$bElisande demonstrates the ultimate disdain for her people. So many lives... wasted!$b$bAll to relay a message: This is what happens to those who defy her.$b$b$n, my friend, we must answer her. We must show her that she cannot slay her people without retribution.$b$bFight back, $n.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 12 of Elisande's Forces in the Waning Crescent, Starcaller Retreat, and Siren's Vigil.
